tasks.title: Add audit logging and event viewing
evidence: No audit log viewing exists in the current codebase.
Audit logs track user actions and are important for compliance.
Splunk REST API provides /services/admin/audit for audit events.
plan: Add audit event models to client.
Implement audit log querying with time range filters.
Add CLI audit command for viewing recent audit events.
Create TUI audit screen for browsing audit logs.
Add tests and update documentation.
